name: Winter Tower Defense
description:
Work-In-Progress [version 0.4]

Protect Wintervale from the invading machine army! Plan your defenses and build mighty towers for the battle to come.

Winter Tower Defense features 30 waves made up of various enemy types and ranks for the player to defend against. Select what kind of tower you want to build and where you want to place it. Towers can be upgraded or sold to re coop some cost and remove the tower if a change of strategy is called for. 

This game is build with inspiration from a custom game type for Warcraft called Wintermaul that I spent way too much time playing.
